desc: Say no to the single use plastic Boba container. Say yes to Stroba™, and enjoy your boba and other beverages in a 5 piece interlocking lid/straw fits in ANY wide mouth mason jar and is dishwasher safe.

layout.text: Transform your Mason Jars and Refuse Single-Use Plastic

-Stroba™: The Better Straw for your Boba. We optimized the flow so you get more boba per sip than traditional single-use plastic cups.
- One Size Fits All: Transforms any Wide Mouth Mason Jar.
-Sealable. Gain the ability to shake your drink up. Not possible with a traditional boba cup.
-Reusable
-Easily Washable/Dishwasher Safe
-BPA Free
-Shipped in Single-Use Plastic Free Packaging
